document_data.name: Evening Star Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Evening Star Inn''' was an inn in the city of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: It stood in the High Town area of the city.
document_data.Description: It was a quite high-quality inn, with windows that could be shuttered and private rooms that could be used to host meetings.
document_data.Services: It could put on lavish meals for large gatherings, including wide varieties of meats, [[cheese]]s, [[bread]]s, and stewed vegetables, as [[wine]]. It was favored by the [[elf|elven]] nobility of the cityâ€”[[Ovendal Beutaleen'dal|Ovendal]], matriarch of the [[Beutaleen'dal]] family, held meetings there.
